wikipedia_page.main: Philip Smith (1885 – after 1910) was an English professional footballer who played as a centre forward. He played in the Football League for both Chelsea and Burnley.

response: Philip or Phil Smith may refer to:
*Phil Smith (footballer, born 1885) (1885–?), English football player for Chelsea and Burnley
*Phil Smith (footballer, born 1979), English football goalkeeper for Swindon, Portsmouth and Aldershot
*Phil Smith, guitarist for The Lovin' Spoonful
*Phil Smith (Alabama politician) (1931-2020), American businessman, lawyer, and politician
*Phil Smith (Australian politician) (born 1938), Australian politician and teacher
